definition: surname Yi/alternative name for 絳|绛[Jiang4] capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
wing/area surrounding the bullseye of a target/to assist/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/old variant of 翌

sentences.english: Forget about level surfaces, forget about standing back, and just pick up your quadrotor and throw it.
sentences.chinese: 忘記水平面，忘記站在後面，就拿起你的旋翼扔。

sentences.english: Did you know that one company is making external airbags for helicopters and rotorcraft ?
sentences.chinese: 你可知道，一個公司對外氣袋直升機和旋翼？

sentences.english: Compared with foreign advanced tilt-rotor technology, we have quite a gap.
sentences.chinese: 與國外先進旋翼技術相比，我們有相當的差距。

sentences.english: The rotation speeds of rotor and whirling bcam are controlled accurately with a method of closed loop.
sentences.chinese: 旋翼和旋轉大臂轉速採用閉環精確控制。

sentences.english: Boeing will be involved in the program through Boeing Rotorcraft Systems.
sentences.chinese: 波音公司將通過波音旋翼系統分部參與該計劃。
一般來說，直升機都是旋翼機。

sentences.english: The pitch link loads of blade is one of the most important parameters in rotor design.
sentences.chinese: 槳葉變距拉桿操縱載荷是旋翼設計的重要參數之一。

sentences.english: An autogiro is supported in flight by unpowered rotating wings.
sentences.chinese: 旋翼機在飛行中是靠無動力旋轉式機翼來支持的。

sentences.english: A model for the nonlinear dynamics of a subminiature rotorcraft is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了超小型旋翼機系統的非線性參數化模型。

sentences.english: Follow the rotorcraft flight manual's normal procedures.
sentences.chinese: 按照旋翼機飛行手冊正常程序操作。

sentences.english: The final design had one main rotator, or rotor.
sentences.chinese: 最後的設計具有一個主旋轉器，也就是旋翼。

sentences.english: The Russian Mi-24 is the brawniestrotary wing bird on the globe.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯的米24是這個地球上最強壯的旋翼飛機。

sentences.english: The company's rotorcraft possess so-called "patent purity".
sentences.chinese: 該公司的旋翼飛機擁有所謂的“專利純潔”。

sentences.english: These also powered two smaller 5-blade props, attached by winglets.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，還有兩個也包含5片轉子的較小旋翼。

sentences.english: Research on the trim and control characters of the helicopter was conducted, which featured with the electrical controlled rotor(ECR).
sentences.chinese: 對採用電控旋翼直升機的配平及操縱特性進行了研究。

sentences.english: The rotor wing produces lift during VTOL, using aerodynamics.
sentences.chinese: 該旋翼產生的電梯在垂直起降，利用空氣動力學。

pinyin: wo1 lun2 pen1 qi4 fa1 dong4 ji1

definition: the front (nose) of a plane etc
the rear (tail) of a plane etc

pinyin: wo1 lun2 zhou2 fa1 dong4 ji1
